ygData.subject: Gender benders
ygData.msgSnippet: http://www.womengamers.com/articles/gender.html This article is about boys who play girls in online games.  It was pretty interesting.  I was surprised at some
ygData.messageBody:
http://www.womengamers.com/articles/gender.html

This article is about boys who play girls in online games. It was pretty
interesting. I was surprised at some of the reasons why boys play girls
in online games.

Another thing that kind of surprised me was that while the "are they gay"
issue was raised, there were no quotes or commentary from a gay survey
respondant. My spider sense says that at least one of the 64 respondants
was gay or bi (there was a crossdresser who responded).

- Tina
